snippet.title: Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Developer Walkthrough | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
Skate, do acrobatics, kill, and look cute while doing it!
Have a look at brand-new Gori: Cuddly Carnage trailer, a foul-mouthed third person hack'n'slash action adventure.
Meet a cute but deadly hero, who knows the best hoverboard tricks. Learn how to slay in a style a mutated unicorn army and disgusting bosses. Mix slashing, bashing, upgrading, and shooting to bring mayhem to your screen!
Expect fast-paced action, cuteness, gore, purring, chaos, dark humour, speed, violence, and creepiness!
Gori: Cuddly Carnage will be available on PS5 & PS4.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
